name: Politics & Culture: A workshop led by V. Geetha from Tara Books | 26 January, 9:45 AM to 12:30 PM
description:
Join us at the bookstore this Republic Day and be a part of an engaging workshop led by V. Geetha from Tara Books. At this workshop we will be discussing books on politics and culture. You can buy tickets for the workshop on  this link.  Here is what the morning will look like-  - Kickstarting the event with an introduction of the theme: 9:45 AM - Discuss the theme in the first book- A POTTER'S TALE: 10 AM  - Activity based on the first theme discussed: 10:20 AM - Sharing the activity and exchanging feedback: 10:45 AM 
 
 <Break> 
 - Discuss the theme in the second book- ANOTHER HISTORY OF THE CHILDREN'S PICTUREBOOK: 11:15 AM  
 - Activity based on the theme discussed: 11:30 AM 
 - Sharing the activity and exchanging feedback: 11: 50 AM 
 
 - Closing note: 12:10 PM 
 
 
 
 
 Things to keep in mind-  
 
 1. We will be discussing two books- A POTTER'S TALE and ANOTHER HISTORY OF THE CHILDREN'S PICTUREBOOK.  
 2. We are looking at a maximum number of 20 participants in this workshop.  
 3. The workshop is priced at 1500 INR.  
 4. Participants will get a special discount on the books discussed in the workshop.  
 
 Looking forward to seeing you at the workshop! Do purchase a ticket to confirm your presence.
